price: 24. Malayka Yallih taaqatal tisbireenimih sabbatah kaak nagaynan siinil tanay keenik itta, toysa tama sin ellecaboy fayla le maxxu meqe ellecabo (jannat kinnuk) kinnii!
arabic: سَلَٰمٌ عَلَيۡكُم بِمَا صَبَرۡتُمۡۚ فَنِعۡمَ عُقۡبَى ٱلدَّارِ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: salāmun ʿalaykum bimā ṣabartum faniʿ'ma ʿuq'bā al-dāri
